title: Two veterans call on President Rajapaksa
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Nalin Hewapathirana) Veteran Film Star Joe Abeywickrama (Gammana Patabendige don John Abeywickrama- 78) paid a visit to President Mahinda Rajapaksa at Temple Trees on 06 May. The reason of this visit and the discussion he had with the President is not known yet….
